channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 20:32 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 20:32 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 18:45 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
